product_name: Stanley Maps Mt. Rainer Climbing Guide
long_description: The Stanley Maps Mt. Rainier Climbing Guide offers full-color, topographical and photo maps profiling 3 routes on Mt. Rainier: Ingram Glacier/Disappointment Cleaver, Fuhrer Finger and Kautz Glacier. 1:24,000 scale topographical map of routes. Includes detailed route and approach descriptions, gear check list and climbing tips. Constructed from waterproof and tear-resistant materials. Stanley Maps Mt. Rainier Climbing Guide opens to 32 x 12 in. and folds down to 12 x 8 in.
short_description: The Stanley Maps Mt. Rainier Climbing Guide offers full-color, topographical and photo maps profiling 3 routes on Mt. Rainier: Ingram Glacier/Disappointment Cleaver, Fuhrer Finger and Kautz Glacier.
